H0.text: Who was the first leader of the Liberal Democrats . David Steel

H1.text: Who was the first leader of the Liberal Democrats . Robert Maclennan

H2.text: Who was the first leader of the Liberal Democrats . Shirley Williams

H3.text: Who was the first leader of the Liberal Democrats . PADDY ASHDOWN

A4.text: Steel and Maclennan initially became joint interim leaders.

A5.text: In its first leadership election, Paddy Ashdown defeated Alan Beith.

A6.text: He served as the final leader of the Liberal Party, from 1976 to 1988.
